text: you know those stories about couples
falling in love at first sight and then
deciding to give up everything to spend
time with one another even though
they've just met well as confusing as
that might sound that is exactly how
amar Matt Daren and myself Thomas ended
up on this crazy journey together I'm
about to tell you how the four of us
went from strangers to best friends to
be honest the way it happened is quite
unusual and our friendship was probably

the early 1990s let's start with amar
from a small industrial city in the

to pursue education abroad starting in
South Africa he eventually ended up on

Darrin left Turkey when he was 18 to

and then there's me Thomas I was born in

and what makes things complicated is

at four months before I graduated
University - a marketing class see man

that I was just learning how to make

in their lives while making this the

started telling everybody about this
idea my friends my bus driver strangers

ended up meeting this incredible guy at
a party called Andrea right off the bat
I told him I couldn't afford rent over

offered me his couch to crash on in his

let's not get ahead of ourselves
before that something else important

I hardly believed them but it's actually

now Amara was only supposed to be in

the three of us had anything felt
possible and then literally on the night

that he in had a vision and an

there was no other option
for him to stay so against all logic
Amara dropped everything he was working
